snippet: PRICE--Barbara J. Anthropologist, treasured friend, respected colleague, and esteemed teacher passed away at 75 years of age in her home on Manhattan's Upper West Side on February 18, 2016 after a short illness. A memorial service is being planned for the spring. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PRICE--Barbara J. Anthropologist, treasured friend, respected colleague, and esteemed teacher passed away at 75 years of age in her home on Manhattan's Upper West Side on February 18, 2016 after a short illness. A memorial service is being planned for the spring. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PRICE, BARBARA J
